title: Ballyhoo
author: Inspired by Jeff O'Neill's Infocom Classic
intro:
The circus has come to town!

Taber's Big Top Circus - featuring death-defying acrobats, trained animals,
clowns, and more! You've come for an evening of entertainment.

But something is wrong. During the show, the young daughter of the circus
owner is KIDNAPPED right before your eyes! The circus folk are acting
strange. The police are baffled.

As an amateur detective with nothing better to do, you decide to investigate.
The kidnapper left behind a ransom note demanding money by midnight.
Time is running out!

Explore the circus, question suspects, find clues, and rescue the girl
before it's too late!

Welcome to Ballyhoo - where the greatest show on Earth hides dark secrets.

rooms.name: Outside the Big Top
rooms.description:
The main circus tent looms before you. Colorful banners flutter. You can
hear music and applause inside. Other areas of the circus grounds spread
around you. The ticket booth is east, the midway is west.

rooms.name: Inside the Big Top
rooms.description:
The main circus arena. Three rings for performances. Bleachers surround.
The show is paused - performers mill about nervously after the kidnapping.
Backstage is north. Exit is south.

rooms.name: Backstage Area
rooms.description:
Behind the scenes. Performers prepare here. Props, costumes, equipment
everywhere. Dressing rooms are west. Animal cages are east. The ring is south.

rooms.name: Dressing Rooms
rooms.description:
Small rooms where performers change. Costumes hang on racks. Makeup
tables with mirrors. The star performer's room is marked. Backstage is east.

rooms.name: Animal Cages
rooms.description:
Cages holding circus animals - lions, elephants, seals. Trainers care
for them. The elephants seem agitated. Backstage is west.

rooms.name: Star's Dressing Room
rooms.description:
The private dressing room of Chelsea Lark, the tightrope walker and
owner's daughter - the kidnapping victim! Her belongings are scattered.
Signs of a struggle. The dressing area is out.

rooms.name: Ticket Booth
rooms.description:
A small booth where tickets are sold. The booth operator looks nervous.
The main area is west. The parking lot is east.

rooms.name: Parking Lot
rooms.description:
Cars and trucks parked haphazardly. Circus trailers for living quarters
are here. The owner's trailer is the largest. Ticket booth is west.

rooms.name: Owner's Trailer
rooms.description:
Andrew Lark's (the owner) personal trailer. He's here, distraught about
his daughter's kidnapping. Photos of Chelsea everywhere. A safe is visible.
The lot is outside.

rooms.name: Midway
rooms.description:
Carnival games and food stands. Ring toss, balloon darts, fried dough.
A few customers wander about. The ferris wheel is north. Main area is east.

rooms.name: Ferris Wheel
rooms.description:
The large ferris wheel sits idle. The operator is missing. From the top,
you'd have a good view of the whole circus. Midway is south.

rooms.name: House of Mirrors
rooms.description:
A maze of distorting mirrors. Your reflection multiplies infinitely.
You could easily get lost here. Or hide something. Midway is north.

rooms.name: Top of Ferris Wheel
rooms.description:
You're at the highest point. From here you see the whole circus layout.
Wait - is that movement near the old maintenance shed? Down is south.

rooms.name: Deep in the Mirror Maze
rooms.description:
You're lost in reflections. But you notice something - a hidden panel
in one mirror! Behind it is a secret passage! Out is north.

rooms.name: Secret Underground Tunnel
rooms.description:
A hidden tunnel beneath the circus! It leads somewhere. Cobwebs and
darkness. The mirror maze is up. The tunnel continues north.

rooms.name: Old Maintenance Shed
rooms.description:
An abandoned shed at the edge of the circus grounds. Dusty, cluttered.
Wait - there's someone here! A figure in a clown costume holds Chelsea!
The tunnel is south. The only exit is through them!

rooms.name: Security Office
rooms.description:
A small office where circus security works. Filing cabinets, radio,
lost and found. An incompetent guard sits here. The grounds are out.

rooms.name: Clown Alley
rooms.description:
Where clowns prepare. Makeup everywhere. Costumes, props, gags. Several
clowns are here, but one is missing - the one who did a special performance
just before the kidnapping. Suspicious.

items.name: ticket stub
items.description: Your circus ticket stub. Section B, Row 12, Seat 7.

items.name: ransom note
items.description: 'I have the girl. $50,000 by midnight or she dies. -C' Crude handwriting.

items.name: torn costume piece
items.description: A piece of fabric from a clown costume. Found near the kidnapping spot.

items.name: Chelsea's diary
items.description:
Chelsea's personal diary. Recent entry: 'Father's new partner gives me
the creeps. Always watching me. I don't trust him.'

items.name: financial records
items.description:
Circus financial records. The circus is broke! Bankrupt! A ransom might
be the only way to get money. But from who?

items.name: clown makeup
items.description:
White makeup with a distinctive smell. Matches residue found on Chelsea's
dressing room mirror.

items.name: binoculars
items.description: Allows you to see distant details. Useful from high places.

items.name: rope
items.description: Strong rope. Could be useful for restraining someone.

items.name: flashlight
items.description: Battery-powered light. Essential for dark tunnels.

monsters.name: Andrew Lark
monsters.description: The circus owner and Chelsea's father. Distraught and worried. Or is he?

monsters.name: Rimshaw the Clown
monsters.description:
The head clown. Jovial exterior but oddly nervous. Where was he during
the kidnapping?

monsters.name: Professor Marvel
monsters.description:
The circus's mysterious new 'partner'. Arrived 3 months ago. Chelsea
didn't trust him. He's acting VERY nervous.

monsters.name: Kidnapper in Clown Disguise
monsters.description: The kidnapper! Wearing a clown costume to blend in. Holding Chelsea captive!

dialogues.greeting: My daughter! Please, you must help find her! I'll pay anything!

topics.response: Chelsea is everything to me. If anything happens to her... I can't bear to think about it.
Professor Marvel? He invested in the circus. But I barely know him. Chelsea didn't like him.

dialogues.greeting: Terrible business, this kidnapping! Just terrible! *nervous laugh*

topics.response: Me? I was performing when it happened. Lots of witnesses!
*shifts uncomfortably* We all wear similar costumes. Could be anyone.

dialogues.greeting: This is a disaster for business! The circus is ruined!

topics.response: Andrew can't pay it. The circus has no money. Unless... *trails off*

quests.name: Find the Kidnapper
quests.description: Investigate the circus and discover who kidnapped Chelsea.

quests.name: Rescue Chelsea
quests.description: Locate and rescue Chelsea before midnight!

puzzles.description: The mirror maze hides a secret panel. Search carefully.
puzzles.success_message: You find the hidden panel! A secret passage!

notes: Solution: Professor Marvel is the kidnapper - insurance fraud scheme
The circus is bankrupt, ransom is a scam
